thread.title: California 661lb woman risks life for weight loss surgery
thread.title_full: California 661lb woman risks life for weight loss surgery

title: California 661lb woman risks life for weight loss surgery
text: show ad 'Nothing hurt as much as when my father would tease me': 661lb woman whose own dad called her 'GODZILLA' sheds 190lbs after risking her life to fly to Houston for gastric bypass surgery Erica Wall from Lompoc, California, went from 661lbs to 471lbs on Wednesday night's episode of the TLC reality series My 600lb Life The 44-year-old had her stomach stapled when she only 16 years old, but five years after the procedure, she gained so much weight, her staple line burst Erica flew to Houston, Texas, despite the risk of her developing a life-threatening blood clot, so she could meet with a weight loss surgeon Although Erica said her nutritionist was wasting her time throwing out her junk food, she eventually lost enough weight to have gastric bypass surgery At the end of the episode, she had lost 190lbs, although she claimed she still felt 'hungry all of the time' Published: 21:11 GMT, 8 February 2017 | Updated: 17:52 GMT, 9 February 2017 247 shares
